creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: self-edged; blue; lined; sash-shaped purse with zipper and two end ties; ten knotted and outlined embroidered floral medallions in reds, blues, green, white, orange; 1/2" scroll border at bottom and small floral embroidery on sides and top edges; gold cord outlining throughout
dimension:
63 1/2 x 4 1/4 in. (161.29 x 10.8 cm) (including ties)
18 1/2 in. (46.99 cm) (object part, tie)
19 1/2 in. (49.53 cm) (object part, tie)
medium: Cotton, zipper, gold colored wrapped cord
title: Purse (or Sash?)
